mapper.select: SELECT c.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, SUM(i.INVEN_COUNT) as invenCount, MAX(i.CREATE_TIME) as createTime FROM INVENTORY i JOIN BREAD b ON i.BREAD_NO = b.BREAD_NO JOIN BREAD_CATEGORY c ON b.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO GROUP BY c.CATEGORY_NAME ORDER BY c.CATEGORY_NAME
SELECT SUM(i.INVEN_COUNT * b.PRICE) as TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM INVENTORY i JOIN BREAD b ON i.BREAD_NO = b.BREAD_NO

SELECT m.USER_NO as userNo, m.USER_NAME as userName, b.BUSINESS_NAME as businessName, p.POSITION_NAME as positionName, m.PHONE as phone FROM "MEMBER" m JOIN "BUSINESS" b ON m.BUSINESS_NO = b.BUSINESS_NO JOIN "POSITION" p ON m.POSITION_NO = p.POSITION_NO WHERE m.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY m.USER_NO ASC

SELECT s.SELL_NO, s.SELL_MONEY, s.BREAD_LIST, s.QUANTITY_LIST, s.CATEGORY_LIST, s.TOTAL_LIST, s.CREATE_DATE, s.BUSINESS_NO, b.BUSINESS_NAME FROM SELL s JOIN BUSINESS b ON s.BUSINESS_NO = b.BUSINESS_NO WHERE s.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) + 0.99999 AND s.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY s.SELL_NO DESC

SELECT b.BREAD_NO, b.CREATE_DATE, b.BREAD_NAME, b.CATEGORY_NO, c.CATEGORY_NAME, b.PRICE, b.STATUS FROM BREAD b JOIN BREAD_CATEGORY c ON b.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO WHERE b.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY b.BREAD_NO ASC
SELECT BUSINESS_NO as businessNo, BUSINESS_NAME as businessName FROM BUSINESS WHERE STATUS = 1 ORDER BY BUSINESS_NO ASC

SELECT s.SELL_NO, s.SELL_MONEY, s.BREAD_LIST, s.QUANTITY_LIST, s.CATEGORY_LIST, s.TOTAL_LIST, s.CREATE_DATE, s.BUSINESS_NO, b.BUSINESS_NAME FROM SELL s JOIN BUSINESS b ON s.BUSINESS_NO = b.BUSINESS_NO WHERE s.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) + 0.99999 AND s.STATUS = 1 AND s.BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} ORDER BY s.SELL_NO DESC
